title: Guided Buying Experience
description: Cloud-based guided buying application for streamlined employee procurement and payment workflows — built as a digital front door for a nonprofit client during an internship.

title: Vernon Order Lookup Tool
description: Order lookup and tracking tool built for a manufacturing client at Vernon LLC — streamlines process visibility and order management.

title: RecyclePlatinum
description: E-commerce platform for precious metal recycling services, featuring a streamlined user experience for selling and tracking recycled materials.

title: Joshinator Analyzer
description: Real-time sports card auction analyzer for live streams — uses OCR, computer vision, and AI to identify cards and pull pricing data in real time.

title: RAgent
description: B2B tax compliance API for tokenized Dutch commercial real estate — automates Box 1/2/3 classification, deemed return calculations, and per-investor PDF tax report generation.

title: Letter Links
description: Multiplayer custom word guessing game — Wordle-style gameplay where you create and share puzzles with friends.

title: Retro Rumble
description: 8-bit Unity football kickoff return game with AI-powered opponent pathfinding, custom sprite art, and sound effects. Built for LSU's CSC4263 game dev course.

title: IEEE 754 Convertor
description: Java utility that converts between decimal, binary, and IEEE 754 floating-point representations — built for LSU's computer architecture coursework.

title: Blackjack
description: Terminal-based Blackjack card game with full deck management, dealer AI, and ace-value selection — AP Computer Science high school project.
